messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, amycats2@a... wrote:
> Hi Norma!
> I'm looking for a natural remedy for psoriasis, mainly on arms
and legs. We
> have been using Dovorex, but it's expensive and the prescription
doesn't last
> nearly long enough!
> Thanks!!
> Amy Kagey

Amy:

Join my homeopathic list and post this question and I will be happy
to post a reply there. I'm sure there are others who could use this
type of information. My list is The Infinitessimal Dose:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Infinitessimal

Norma

Hi Norma!
I'm looking for a natural remedy for psoriasis, mainly on arms and legs. We
have been using Dovorex, but it's expensive and the prescription doesn't last
nearly long enough!
Thanks!!
Amy Kagey

Amy:

I'm a homeopathic practitioner with 30 years experience. You can

to questions and post info on current homeopathic news, like my most

Norma
